nodes.text: Gron Marrab was a male Mon Calamari senator. He represented Calamari sector in the New Republic Senate and its Galactic Alliance successor. He served on the Council on Security and Intelligence.

Following the Battle of Coruscant, Marrab was made leader of the commission to maintain and restore the New Republic's communications networks. He accepted the help of Han Solo, Leia Organa Solo, and the Ryn Network reluctantly, although later admitted their help in solving the communications failures.
